summary: I always thought it was strange that you could join the Bards College, but you had nowhere to sleep! This mod attempts to make the Bards college a more livable place.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds:

A player bed
two weapon racks
A cooking pot
A sheild rack
An enchanting table
An alchemy table and pouch
An extra room with several usable bookshelves
As well as a few storage cupboards, chest, and some extra foliage.

You will have to be a member of the Bards College to use these additions
author: Modelmode
